bug.author: zzzace2000
bug.description: Hi, I found the second half of the tutorial of GP regression is broken. <denchmark-link:http://gpflow.readthedocs.io/en/latest/notebooks/regression.html>http://gpflow.readthedocs.io/en/latest/notebooks/regression.html</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: yikes! good spot. I just submitted a PR to fix this, thanks.
Somehow this still hasn't been fixed. Which PR are you referring to, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jameshensman>@jameshensman</denchmark-link> ?
